channel.title: Cant trade, or drop for 60 mins when you make a new account /Timer
channel.description:
Hello, i want to make it so that every time you make a new account you can't trade for 60 mins so you've got to be logged in for atleast 60 mins before you can trade or drop items...
Can you please give some codes if you have some
Or even a tut as i couldnt find one
Thanks help is much appreciated

item.title: Cant trade, or drop for 60 mins when you make a new account /Timer
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:

would this be in as im usin delta source canOffer = true; tradeConfirmed = false; tradeConfirmed2 = false; offeredItems.clear(); inTrade = false; trade_reqId = 0; other.closeInterface(); other.inTrade = false;

item.title: Cant trade, or drop for 60 mins when you make a new account /Timer
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

Use an integer to count for the minutes.

[code]public int tradeTimer = 0;

public int dropTimer = 0;[/code]

Then find your method for sending trade requests and add

[code]if (tradeTimer >= 600000) {
//your send trade method here

else {
sM(“You must wait 60 minutes to trade”);[/code]

Read full topic
